column4: I have a problem with viewing my files on a removable flash drive...
I use it for my phone (it's a micro sd card)
but it doesnt seem to show it on my desktop
Does anyone know how to get a usb flash drive to mount in ubuntu? It won't show on my desktop or in places>computer.
Jack_sparrow: I have a problem with windows where the usb flash drive won't detect when.. I think My back usb ports are only usb 1.0
switch to console (CTRL-ALT-F1), plug in the device and check if there is any message popping up
